technologies.headline: Technologies
technologies.firstParagraph: For more than a year, I have been actively using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript in projects. I have developed my first interactive web applications with Angular and gained initial experience in backend integration using Firebase. Agile methodologies like Scrum help me work in a structured and efficient manner.
technologies.secondParagraph: Web technologies are evolving rapidly – and that’s exactly what excites me! I continuously learn, test new approaches, and optimize my code to create not only functional but also modern and high-performance solutions.

myProjects.paragraph: Explore a Section of all my work here - interact with the projects to see my skills in action!

colleagueExperience.headline: What my colleagues say about me

contactMe.headline: Let`s work together!
contactMe.paragraph: Contact me through this form, I am inderested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
